trans-unit.source: Exposes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> subtree for the data items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> 中資料項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 樹狀子目錄公開至使用者介面自動化。

trans-unit.source: When data items are shown in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], the system creates a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> subtree for the data items.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目中所示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，系統會建立<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>資料項目樹狀子目錄。

trans-unit.source: The system also creates an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> for each data item.
trans-unit.target: 系統也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>每個資料項目。

trans-unit.source: When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for the data item is created, this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer> is also created.
trans-unit.target: 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的資料項目建立時，這<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer>也會建立。

trans-unit.source: The two peers then merge to form a single peer.
trans-unit.target: 兩個對等然後合併以形成單一的對等。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。
